body_html:
BYTE_ORDER is defined by gcc and windows compiles with msvc which does not define it.
There is no platform specific platform.h and looking over the source I see lots of places that include cpu_info.h directly. Maybe a decent compromise between clean and safe would be to create a new include platform/windows/msvc_compat.h and include this in cpu_info.h under #ifdef COMPILER_MSVC.
@mrry what do you think?
